nodes.text: The Sebiris Run was a hyperspace route located in the Kathol sector at the edge of the galaxy. This hyperlane along with the Galtea Run originated at Pembric II at the terminus of the Trition Trade Route. These two hyperroutes were the only spacelanes that crossed the Marcol Void. The Sebiris Run connected Sebiris with the worlds of the Pimbrellan League, such as Dolstan and Swedlan, before intersecting with the Galatea Run at Timbra Ott.
